document.full_text: the oakland athletics breathed a sigh of relief on wednesday when closing pitcher andrew bailey was cleared of serious injury, although he may still miss the start of the major league baseball season.
document.title: a's closer bailey gets good news about elbow injury
lines_and_colors: the oakland athletics breathed a sigh of relief on wednesday when closing pitcher andrew bailey was cleared of serious injury, although he may still miss the start of the major league baseball season.
